author: guitargeek
body:
#### PR description:

The PhysicsTools/ParallelAnalysis seems to be completely unmaintained, and I think it's also unused with all the new analysis methods that people use nowadays (e.g. ROOT RDataFrame, Python ecosystem..). Can it be removed to avoid maintenance burden in the future?

#### PR validation:

CMSSW compiles.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

No backport intended.
title: Remove PhysicsTools/ParallelAnalysis package
